homePage.introduction: A highly curious Computer Engineering Student, I thrive on tackling new challenges and diving deep into the ever-evolving world of technology. While experienced in software and hardware development, my enthusiasm extends broadly, with a significant interest in the intricacies of CPU design and the transformative potential of AI/Machine Learning.

aboutMe.title: About Me
aboutMe.introduction: Hello! I'm Giovan, a dedicated and results-oriented Computer Engineering Student at the University of Indonesia with a passion for crafting efficient solutions, whether in software or hardware. I thrive in collaborative environments and am always eager to learn new technologies and take on challenging projects.
aboutMe.areaBackend: Strong proficiency in Backend Development (Node.js, Express.js, Python, API Design, PostgreSQL).
aboutMe.areaVHDL: Skilled VHDL Developer with an interest in CPU design, FPGAs, and digital logic.
aboutMe.areaAI: Keen interest and foundational knowledge in Artificial Intelligence (AI) and Machine Learning concepts.

achievements: Digital Laboratory Assistant, Department of Electrical Engineering
Relevant Coursework: Digital Systems, Basic C Programming, Digital System Design, Basic Computing, Advanced C Programming, Digital System Design with VHDL (FPGA)

responsibilities: Assisting in the development of digital experiments to enhance students' practical experience.
Providing technical support to students and the department in the use of laboratory equipment and software.
Maintaining and upgrading laboratory equipment to support learning.

Supporting practical lab sessions for various courses including Fundamentals of Digital Systems, Basic C Programming, Digital System Design, Basic Computing, Advanced C Programming, and Digital System Design with VHDL (FPGA).

Special Projects: Established the server environment for the Digital Laboratory using Linux, Docker, and network configuration; Implemented a new Learning Management System (LMS) for Digilab utilizing Docker and tunneling technology; Developed and integrated an auto-checker system for practical assignments.

entries.company: Wiradha UI (University of Indonesia Public Relations)
responsibilities: Managed and developed the official university website (ui.ac.id) using WordPress, which attracted over 5.5 million accesses during the internship period.
Supported major events organized by UI, such as the 2024 Graduation Event and the UI International Education Expo 2024.
Collaborated with the design team to create creative publications and congratulatory posters.
Uploaded the latest press releases and ensured timely updates of event schedules on the website.

entries.company: EXERCISE FTUI (Executive Organization of Students of Engineering Faculty of Universitas Indonesia)
responsibilities: Oversaw strategic planning and operational execution to ensure the organization met its objectives effectively.
Managed divisions and their respective teams, aligning their initiatives with the organization's long-term vision.
Led the backend development team for the PEMIRA-eVoting application, which successfully supported over 2,700 voters with more than 40,000 accesses.
Applied technical expertise in development and DevOps engineering to ensure efficient, scalable, and secure application delivery.
Instrumental in designing and developing software solutions for several ongoing projects.
Designed UI/UX for an IoT application to monitor the condition of the elderly.
Created a Node.js library to prevent SQL injection, XSS attacks, and manage IP blacklists/whitelists as middleware.
Acted as a Backend developer in digitizing the project flow from KarsaBuana Lab, using ExpressJS and MongoDB, and ensured API endpoints functioned correctly using Postman.

featuredProjects.title: Featured Projects
featuredProjects.description: Here are some of the projects I'm proud to have worked on.

allProjectsPage.title: All My Projects
allProjectsPage.description: Here's a collection of projects I've worked on. Explore them all!
allProjectsPage.noProjects: No projects to display at the moment.

projectsData.title: PEMIRA FTUI 2024 eVoting Application
projectsData.description: Led the software team and developed robust backend features using Node.js, Express.js, and PostgreSQL for a secure and efficient e-voting system. Integrated Redis for caching, JWT for authentication, Winston for logging, and deployed using Docker & Docker Compose. Successfully served over 2,700 voters.

projectsData.title: EcoShopper
projectsData.description: Developed a web application to encourage sustainable consumption by offering eco-friendly alternatives. Led the development of a dynamic database and a recommendation algorithm assessing the environmental impact of products. Supports SDGs 12, 13, and 15.

projectsData.title: RISCV CPU 16-bit (FPGA)
projectsData.description: Designed and simulated an FPGA-based CPU using VHDL. Implemented components such as ALU, register file, and decoder. Utilized ModelSim and Xilinx Vivado for simulation and synthesis.

projectsData.title: KarsaBuana Lab Backend Development
projectsData.description: Responsible for backend development, designing and implementing data handling and processing infrastructure. Developed APIs for robust data interaction and ensured backend scalability.

projectsData.title: 1xBid Bidding Platform
projectsData.description: Contributed to the backend architecture and frontend development of a real-time bidding platform. Integrated essential features like user authentication, real-time data processing, and secure transaction handling.

projectsData.title: Personal Portfolio Website
projectsData.description: Designed and developed a responsive portfolio website to showcase professional journey, skills, experiences, and projects. Built with React, Tailwind CSS, and Framer Motion with i18next for multi-language support.

projectsData.title: MightyShield - JS Security Library
projectsData.description: Created a JavaScript (Node.js) library to provide essential cybersecurity functionalities, including SQL injection prevention, XSS attack mitigation, and IP blacklist/whitelist management as middleware.

projectsData.title: Image-ColorScaler (VHDL/FPGA)
projectsData.description: Developed an Image-ColorScaler system using VHDL on an FPGA to transform colored images into grayscale and other color scales (greenscale, redscale, bluescale) to simplify image processing.

projectsData.title: JBus Bus Ordering Simulation App
projectsData.description: Final project for OOP course, creating backend and frontend for the JBus application to simulate bus ordering.

projectsData.title: Discord Bot - Python
projectsData.description: Created a Discord bot using Python to help organize personal Discord servers.

projectsData.title: BluetoothApps Smartwatch (UI Design)
projectsData.description: Designed and implemented the User Interface (UI) for a smartwatch application intended to monitor and manage the medical records of elderly individuals, ensuring ease of use.

downloadCV.title: Download My CV
downloadCV.description: Interested in learning more about my professional background? Download my CV for a detailed review.
downloadCV.fileNameNote: (CV File Name: Giovan_Sihombing.pdf - Ensure the file is in the `public` directory.)
